title: Rajasthan RSSB Clerk Grade-II & Junior Assistant Hiring 2026
overview:
üì¢ Recruitment Overview

The online registration process for this recruitment commenced on 15 January 2026 and will remain open until 13 February 2026. Candidates who are interested and eligible must ensure that their application is submitted before the closing date. Applicants should fall within the age range of 18 to 40 years, calculated as of 01 January 2027. üìå Age relaxation will be provided strictly as per RSSB government norms. üîî Important: Candidates are strongly advised to carefully read the official notification before applying to avoid any mistakes related to eligibility, age limits, or important dates.
